instruction: Please provide an explanation of the performance of the China Green Bond Index in comparison to the Broad Bond Index as of December 31, 2021.
output: As of December 31, 2021, the duration of the China Green Bond Index was slightly longer than the Broad Bond Index, with a difference of approximately 0.7 years. This is one of the factors contributing to the excellent performance of green bonds in the bond market during the rebound period in 2021.
